---
title: "Causality"
author: "Annmary Jose"
---


# Assignment

1.  Load the necessary libraries:


::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_d5895cc6a308f3bf880f9ffd7c0b47a6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
#load libaray
library(ggplot2)
```
:::


2.  Create a dataset with two variables:


::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_99d9795ad3f666ada3b95ea8d2aa0f5b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x_axis <- rnorm(n, mean = 50, sd = 10)
y_axis <- 2 * x_axis + rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = 20)

data <- data.frame(x_axis, y_axis)
```
:::


3.  Create a scatter plot


    ::: {.cell hash='04_causality_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_87b94b75baac381863eeb7faeffe3ee1'}
    
    ```{.r .cell-code}
    ggplot(data, aes(x = x_axis, y = y_axis)) +
      geom_point() +
      geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "green") +
      labs(title = "Spurious Correlation",
           x = " X axis",
           y = " Y axis")
    ```
    
    ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
    ```
    #> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
    ```
    :::
    
    ::: {.cell-output-display}
    ![](04_causality_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
    :::
    :::
